Name: ZIC – Zombies in City
About the game: ZIC: Zombies In City is a first person zombie survival shooter where you have to save the world from a pandemic zombie apocalypse! The undead zombies come out of a fog at night. Zombie infection spread throughout the city and initiated a zombie apocalypse. Walking dead everywhere... The deadly virus hasn't touched only some of people and it's the last hope for humanity. Life will bring together 4 different characters in the zombie killer squad able to withstand the onslaught of the walking dead! They must stop a pandemic zombie infection with weapons! Genre – first person zombie survival shooter Story mode – interesting storyline about escaped survivors Zombie killer squad – 4 heroes with unique character and history like in left 4 dead 10 different zombie types, monsters and enemy marauder Large selection of deadly weapons – chainsaw, uzi, grenade, rocket launcher, AK-47, baton, machete, bat, pistol & revolver
